    • Method Detail

      • register

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response register(java.lang.String info)
        Registers a Software Agent into the database and cache memory.
        Parameters:
        info - RegisterInfo
        Returns:
        a HTTP 200 status if successful

      • acceptance

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response acceptance(java.lang.String hashKey)
        Checks if the requesting Software Agent has been confirmed.
        Parameters:
        hashKey - the Software Agent's hash key
        Returns:
        • a HTTP 202 status if accepted
        • a HTTP 102 status if pending
        • a HTTP 101 status if declined

      • requestjobs

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response requestjobs(java.lang.String hashKey)
        Sends the assigned nmap jobs to the requesting Software Agent.

        The assigned jobs are directly removed from the Cache.addMap.

        Parameters:
        hashKey - the Software Agent's hash key
        Returns:
        a string in JSON format representing the nmap jobs

      • sendresults

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response sendresults(java.lang.String res)
        Inserts the sent job results into the database and cache memory.

        The sent results must be in JSON format.

        Parameters:
        res - the job results in JSON format
        Returns:
        a HTTP 200 status if successful

      • monitor

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response monitor()
        Stores the map of accepted Software Agents and their information in a JSON string
        Returns:
        the JSON string constructed by the acceptedMap

      • history

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response history(java.lang.String hashKey)
        Stores the map of onetime and the map of periodic nmap jobs in JSON strings
        Parameters:
        hashKey - the Software Agent's hash key
        Returns:
        the JSON string constructed by the JSON strings mentioned before

      • addjobs

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addjobs(java.lang.String wrapper)
        Inserts the sent jobs into the database and cache memory.

        The sent jobs must be in JSON format.

        Parameters:
        wrapper - the jobs and the hashKey of SA they belong in JSON format
        Returns:
        a HTTP 200 status if successful

      • periodic

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response periodic(java.lang.String hashKey)
        Stores the map of active nmap jobs in a JSON string
        Parameters:
        hashKey - the Software Agent's hash key
        Returns:
        the JSON string constructed by the activeMap

      • deletejob

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deletejob(java.lang.String wrapper)
        Deletes the the sent jobs from the database and cache memory.

        The sent jobs must be in JSON format.

        Parameters:
        wrapper - a JSON string for the hashKey of SA and a JSON string for the jobid packed in another JSON string
        Returns:
        a HTTP 200 status if successful

      • terminate

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response terminate(java.lang.String hashKey)
        Terminates the SA defined by the hashKey parameter
        Parameters:
        hashKey - the Software Agent's hash key
        Returns:
        a HTTP 200 status if successful

      • androidLogin

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response androidLogin(java.lang.String info)
        Validates the AndroidInfo and checks if the android user can be connected.

        The AndroidInfo must be in JSON format.

        Parameters:
        info - AndroidInfo
        Returns:
        the appropriate message: "wrongPassword", "connected", "pending", "wrongUsername" in JSON format

      • androidRegister

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response androidRegister(java.lang.String info)
        Validates the AndroidInfo and checks if the android user can be registered.

        The AndroidInfo must be in JSON format.

        Parameters:
        info - AndroidInfo
        Returns:
        the appropriate message: "true", "false" in JSON format

      • results

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response results(java.lang.String hashKey)
        Stores the list of nmap results for the SA defined by the hashKey parameter in a JSON string
        Parameters:
        hashKey - the Software Agent's hash key
        Returns:
        the JSON string constructed by the list of resultMap as far as this hashKey is concerned

      • allresults

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response allresults()
        Stores the list of nmap results for every SA in a JSON string
        Returns:
        the JSON string constructed by the list of resultMap and the hashKey of SA

      • details

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response details(java.lang.String idJobResult)
        Stores the list of nmap details for the job defined by the idJobResult parameter in a JSON string
        Parameters:
        idJobResult - the id of the job asking for result's details
        Returns:
        the JSON string constructed by the list of xmlMap as far as this job is concerned

      • status

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response status()
        Returns:
        a HTTP 200 status if successful
